metadata.name: Entreaty
metadata.description:
"Entreaty"

Negative environmental pressures from human actions affect climate change. The increase in the rate of greenhouse gases in the atmosphere causes global warming and climate change. With this work, I painted the revolt of the land and nature.

ARTIST : Nuri ÇOBAN

DATE : 2018

EDITION : 1/1

FILE EXTENSION : JPEG - 8.5 Mb

LOCATION : Kocaeli /TURKEY

DIMENSION : 6814 x 4370 px

RESOLUTION : 300 DPI 

CATEGORY : Expermental

Awards of this photo in the competitions:

1-“Highly Commended”  Siena Creative Photo Awards 2020. (Experimental category)

2- “FIAP Bronze Medal",İzmir Goztepe Rotary Club 6th International Photography Competition ( FIAP 2020/164 )

3- “GPU Gold Medal", Arbella 9 th International Photography Contest (FIAP 2019/026) (PSA 2019/057) (GPU L190004)
